text.div: • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-RoleClass where concept is-a SGNOFF

name: RoleClassSigningAuthorityOrOfficer
title: RoleClassSigningAuthorityOrOfficer
description: The role of a person (player) who is the officer or signature authority for of a scoping entity, usually an organization (scoper).
